Package fr.pantheonsorbonne.miage

Interface InternalFacadePlumbing

All Known Implementing Classes:
FacadeImpl
public interface InternalFacadePlumbing
This is more advanced interface to used for advanced game management. Students are not expected to use this interface for their assignements
